name: Fancy Emails
description:
Professional email templating for sophisticated SOCs.

- Easy Logo Implementation
- Consistent Layout & Theme
- Customizable Color Scheme, Footers, Logo, etc
- Automatic conversion of datetime to local times
- Themed Table Generation with support for Custom HTML
- Easy creation of professional looking indicator tables (!MakeFancyEmailIndicatorTable)
- Use out of the box with the Cortex Theme or Customize it
- Comes with a Generic Email Template (!SendFancyEmail) and an Incident Status Template (!SendFancyEmailIncidentStatus)
author: Evan Yandle
